text: Tanzania was first at the Olympic Games in 1964. They have been in every Summer Olympic Games since then, except for the boycotted 1976 Games. The nation has been in the Winter Olympic Games. The National Olympic Committee for Tanzania was formed in 1968 and recognized by the International Olympic Committee that same year. ==List of medalists== Medal Name Games Sport Event 1980 Moscow Athletics Men's 3000 m steeplechase 1980 Moscow Athletics Men's 5000 m ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References== ==Other websites== * * United Republic of Tanzania profile at London2012.com Category:Sport in Tanzania Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Tanzania at the Olympics
